alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:43AM EST until January 11 at 1:59PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Yellow River at Gees Mill Road affecting Rockdale and Newton Counties. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Lilburn, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast to occur. * WHERE...Yellow River at Gees Mill Road. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, moderate flooding begins. In Newton County... Riverside Estates Travel and Mobile Home Park begins to experience significant flooding. Trailers must be moved to higher ground and several mobile homes will flood. Evacuations may be needed. In Rockdale County...some flooding begins in the Lake Capri subdivision. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 3.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EST.
